
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/mingupupu/p/18696672" title="发布于 2025-02-02 08:57">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">DeepSeekV3+Roo Code，智能编码好助手</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h2 id="前言">前言</h2>
<p>硅基流动最近上线了deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-R1与deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-V3，感兴趣快来试试吧！</p>
<p>邀请注册得14元不过期额度：<a href="https://cloud.siliconflow.cn/i/Ia3zOSCU%E3%80%82" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://cloud.siliconflow.cn/i/Ia3zOSCU。</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656273-1873409736.png" alt="image-20250202084545172" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="实践">实践</h2>
<p>最近VS Code中的自动编程插件Cline很火爆，Roo Code也是Cline的一个fork版本。</p>
<p><strong>Cline</strong></p>
<p>自主编码代理直接集成在您的 IDE 中，能够创建/编辑文件，执行命令，使用浏览器等，每一步都需您的许可。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656378-1509284085.png" alt="image-20250202081003394" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>首先在Cline中接入SiliconCloud可以使用OpenAI Compatible这种方式，配置如下所示：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656375-109602138.png" alt="image-20250202081241737" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>以创建一个使用ts的next.js项目todo-demo为例，查看效果。</p>
<p>之前使用Cline还好好的，但是最近遇到了这个问题：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656307-1499464432.png" alt="image-20250202081507401" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>因此开始尝试使用Roo Code。</p>
<p><strong>Roo Code</strong></p>
<p>Roo Code（原名 Roo Cline）是 VS Code 插件，通过 AI 驱动的自动化、多模型支持和实验性功能增强编码。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656367-946902598.png" alt="image-20250202081802147" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>安装Roo Code：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656399-1700150743.png" alt="image-20250202081858277" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>配置方式与Cline相同：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656396-2061665889.png" alt="image-20250202081933858" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>开始测试使用DeepSeek-V3的效果：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656417-305452925.png" alt="image-20250202082142598" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>运行的每一个命令，都需要你同意。</p>
<p>安装next.js模板：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656331-377770883.png" alt="image-20250202082239724" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>安装antd：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656338-1655373593.png" alt="image-20250202082357679" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>自动编写代码：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656419-1333049614.png" alt="image-20250202082455957" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>写完的代码还有一个报错，但是显示任务已完成：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656403-2118945655.png" alt="image-20250202082754213" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>如果自己解决不了，继续让Roo Code解决:</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656407-696094148.png" alt="image-20250202083305520" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查看效果：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656366-828080813.png" alt="image-20250202083551586" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>感觉还可以。</p>
<p>推荐给大家，可以提升自己的编码效率。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202502/3288240-20250202085656384-1597448648.png" alt="image-20250202084031409" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>token消耗量也还可以，只花了12万多，只用了0.13元。</p>

</div>
